author: Jason
text: When is @NASCAR going to stop sitting on their shoulders and make it a rule that caution laps do not count within the final 10 laps of a race?!?

author: Jason
text: I'm watching @nflnetwork and I'm seeing the biggest group of morons outside the stadium... Bengals "fans" #bandwagonfans #idiots #actlikeitsachampionshipgame #disgracetothegame
